title: Mother of Palatka teen who accidentally shot himself in head says son is now brain dead
content:
The mother of a 17-year-old Palatka teen who accidentally shot himself in the head Monday told authorities her son has been declared brain dead and is now on life support, according to the Palatka Police Department.
The teen shot himself in the head Monday about 5 p.m. in the 200 block of Benham Street, but it’s unclear where the teen obtained the gun, police said. Detectives are still investigating. The boy’s name and further details have not been released.
